name: adlib
overview:
adlib provides IT related technical consulting services, including web programing, website and mobile website building, network service platform and security. adlib also invests in and/or establishes those companies which create new value in the related markets.

adlib is familiar with such technologies as Windows, Linux, FreeBSD, and LAMP.

Following are the network services owned and run by adlib:

  • gw.jp: This allows you to convert an attachment file on e-mail to a downloadable URL. Just add the word of ‘gw.jp’ at the end of the email address of your receiver when you send an email with a large attachment, e.g.) To: xyz@sample.com -> xyz@sample.comgw.jp. This xyz@sample.com will receive your email without attachment. Instead downloadable URLs will be added to the body message. No registration reqired.
  • mementa.net: This saves avatar’s action and replays at Secondlife. See in detail http://mementa.net/

adlib also recently established a new company called adinterest.net, providing a new service. This service unifies affiliates and drop-shipping services and displays them in one on user’s PC site. Items to be displayed are selected automatically based on user’s keywords and the trendies. Users do not need to reset the items. See in detail http://www.adinterest.net (Japanese only).
